This was the worst restaurant experience I have had in my 9 years living in Charleston. We went for Valentines Day dinner. Nothing is romantic about the place, the lights are on high bean, over crowded second floor dining room and over …

Really amazing experience and I can honestly say that I only ate two bites of steak from my husband’s plate as I am trying to be a better vegetarian. The food, atmosphere and service was just amazing! I really hope that this place finds the success it deserves here in Charleston! I will be coming back for sure ❤️
Great meats... Great atmosphere ... Glad it opened up where it did.  Game-changer for downtown Charleston. Highly recommend. Will be coming back.

The meats are amazingly cooked and a very nice atmosphere inside.   Everybody is very attentive.. great addition to the already large restaurant selection in charleston. You should try this one if you love your meats !
